H0.text: The purple grenadilla is another name for which fruit. Passion Fruit

H1.text: The purple grenadilla is another name for which fruit. Plum

H2.text: The purple grenadilla is another name for which fruit. Guanabana

H3.text: The purple grenadilla is another name for which fruit. Parcha

A4.text: In Puerto Rico, where the fruit is known as 'parcha', it is used in juices, ice cream or pastries.
